title: The three biggest reasons LeBron and the Lakers are flailing in the West
description: Another season of blowouts and fighting to make the play-in begs the question: Can the Lakers be fixed?
author: Dave McMenamin

title: ESPN analyst Moss announces battle with cancer
description: NFL Hall of Fame wide receiver Randy Moss announced that he has been battling a cancer found outside of his bile duct between his pancreas and liver.

title: Four-try Sale cruise to victory over Racing
description: Sale run out comfortable winners over Racing 92 in their Champions Cup match at Salford Community Stadium.

title: Chelsea 'best team in Premier League' - Frank
description: Chelsea are "maybe the best team in the Premier League right now", says Brentford manager Thomas Frank.

title: The landing spot that makes most sense in the Jimmy Butler trade saga
description: The Heat are reportedly willing to listen to offers for their star forward, who could become a free agent this summer. Will the 35-year-old's wish list be fulfilled?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Nick Rolovich to join Cal coaching staff, his first college job since being fired for refusing COVID vaccine
description: Rolovich had coached in high school and the XFL during his time away from college football.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Tuchel on: Kane's captaincy, Palmer's form, England WC prospects
description: Thomas Tuchel spoke to Sky Sports News' chief reporter Kaveh Solhekol after the 2026 World Cup qualifying draw and answered questions on a range of big talking points about him taking over as England head coach - including whether Harry Kane would remain a first-choice and captain.

title: England, Scotland, Wales, NI and ROI discover WC qualifying fixtures
description: England will face Serbia, Albania, Latvia and Andorra in 2026 World Cup qualifying, while Scotland could face Portugal or Denmark, Wales meet Belgium and Northern Ireland take on either Germany or Italy.
